alert.note: Alert for Central Chippewa; Southeast Chippewa; Western Chippewa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 16 at 7:09AM EST until December 16 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Southeast Chippewa, Western Chippewa and Central Chippewa Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Chippewa; Southeast Chippewa; Western Chippewa
